name: Sanitation
description:
In Sanitation, you play as a worker tasked with fixing pipes in a dark and creepy sewer system. As you go about your job, you must also survive the evil monster that lurks in the shadows, chasing you through the tunnels. With gameplay inspired by survival horror classics like Slenderman and Five Nights at Freddy's, you'll need all your wits and quick reflexes to stay alive. As you progress through the game, you'll uncover the mystery of the monster's origins and learn the true terror of the sewers. With a visually stunning and atmospheric world, Sanitation offers a unique and terrifying gaming experience for fans of horror and survival.

Currently, a limited prototype is the only release of this game, available from the download links down below. This prototype is meant as a tech-demo of the idea and the core gameplay loop, and is a short 5 minute experience. The prototype does not represent the full game, however it will give inspiration for how this game might play like when finished.
